system.requirements:
Tier 3; BS 50, Weapon Training (Chosen One) 
Aptitudes: Finesse, Ballistic Skill
system.effect:
Once per Combat Encounter, character can make an Aim Action as a Free Action for the chosen weapon group.
For this Talent, choose one weapon group character has Weapon Training in. Can take this talent multiple times, each time choosing a different group.
Example Groups: Bolt, Flame, Las, Launcher, Melta, Plasma, Low Tech(Primitive), SP, or Heavy
